turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello how are you today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi, I'm great, how are you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am fine, thank you, Have you ever heard about the organization "Save the Children"?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I have. I am not extremely familiar with them, but I have seen several ads for them.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is a big organization saving the children in almost 120 countries. are you interested in donating?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I would be happy to donate to that charity. Do you have an amount in mind?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Not any specific amount, anything can be good, no matter small or big. I usually donate to big organizations myself, and I have a soft heart for children

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I do, too. I tend to find it easy to be sympathetic towards several different types of charities. From what I have seen about Save the Children I've always been impressed with the work they do.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Same here, Specially when i see how they are clear with their financial and how they try to help all children all around the world

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I agree. I feel much better donating to places where I feel confident that the money  is going to where they say it will. I think Save the Children is the biggest charity of it's kind.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Same here, It is also nice when I can donate anonymously. It makes my heart happy how people know about these organization and they actually donate

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm like you. I always try to donate anonymously. I don't feel the need to be recognized for any good I can do.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Same here, and I like how some HITs encourage us to donate. I've been donating more since I've started working on MTurk.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's funny that you mention that. I always wonder how many people donate any bonuses that are offered to them. I always donate most if not all of any money I am offered. I figure that I wasn't expecting it to begin with so better to do some good however much.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I donate most of my bonus when I can, I feel like it is free money and others deserve it more. The good thing about it is when you want to donate on websites they usually have a minimum, but with HITs there is no minimum amount

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, some of these Universities really impress me with how much they are willing to donate. I know some of them get  really large amounts for studies and I appreciate when they use the money to do some good while gaining research.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Exactly and they pay to workers good enough so they will be willing to donate. It is worth a lot. Specially when it is really trustworthy organization

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, and then most are willing to provide proof that they actually donated money, so that is good.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, Thank you for time and attention, and thanks for helping. Have a nice day!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you so much, same to you!
